quotes.quote: An expert is a person who avoids small error as he sweeps on to the grand fallacy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Stolberg

quotes.quote: Where facts are few, experts are many.
quotes.author: Donald R. Gannon

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: My definition of an expert in any field is a person who knows enough about what's really going on to be scared.
quotes.author: P. J. Plauger

quotes.quote: If the world should blow itself up, the last audible voice would be that of an expert saying it can't be done.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Always listen to experts. They'll tell you what can't be done and why. Then do it.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities. In the expert's mind there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: Believe one who has proved it. Believe an expert.
quotes.author: Virgil
